content.raw:
this might not be a very good news, but there is a huge memory leak that appears when models are spawned while there are double pendulums, i've made the pose/stamped subscriber 'latch' the messages, but there is still, so if anyone notices anything that could be the reason for the leak.
![leak.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/3687351920-leak.png)
content.html: this might not be a very good news, but there is a huge memory leak that appears when models are spawned while there are double pendulums, i've made the pose/stamped subscriber 'latch' the messages, but there is still, so if anyone notices anything that could be the reason for the leak.
